actions.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Finance.

official_title: A bill to amend  the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand income averaging to include the trade or business of fishing and to provide a business credit against income for the purchase of fishing safety equipment.
short_title: Commercial Fishermen Safety and Tax Fairness Act of 2000

summary.text: Commercial Fishermen Safety and Tax Fairness Act of 2000 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to extend commercial fishermen the same income averaging provisions currently allowed to farmers.Allows commercial fishermen a fishing safety equipment credit.

titles.title: Commercial Fishermen Safety and Tax Fairness Act of 2000

A bill to amend  the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to expand income averaging to include the trade or business of fishing and to provide a business credit against income for the purchase of fishing safety equipment.
